document.full_text: pittsburgh penguins captain sidney crosby was back on skates for the first time in nearly 10 weeks monday, but had no clue if he would play again this season.
document.title: crosby back on ice, return to game action still in doubt
lines_and_colors: pittsburgh penguins captain sidney crosby was back on skates for the first time in nearly 10 weeks monday, but had no clue if he would play again this season.
